doc.title: Happy Hooligan Earns His Dinner
doc.plot: Hooligan gets a hand-out from a housewife on the promise that he will saw some wood. Having devoured the food, he proceeds to decamp, but is arrested by the housewife, who, with a gun ready for action, forces Hooligan to saw as fast as he can. Hooligan's antics are very funny.
